cleaned_text: Zinc 30 mg Tablets100.0ea How would you like to receive this item ? Wellness in a snap1 Description - Supports the immune system - Vital for normal growth & development - No artificial flavors or preservatives Nature Made Zinc 30 mg Tablets are a dietary supplement that supports the body's natural immune defense system. Sourced from high-quality ingredients, this gluten free Nature Made Zinc supplement contains no color added, no artificial flavors and no preservatives. Zinc is an essential nutrient and antioxidant support that plays a role in numerous reactions in the body. This Nature Made Zinc 30 mg supplement supports a healthy immune system and helps support healthy skin. Adults take one of these 30 mg Zinc tablets daily with water and a meal. Nature Made supplements are quality you can trust. USP has tested and verified ingredients, potency and manufacturing process. USP sets official standards for dietary supplements. Visit the USP verified website for more information. *Based on a survey of pharmacists who recommend branded vitamins and supplements. - Immune health and antioxidant support supplement: contains one 100 count bottle of Nature Made Zinc 30 mg Tablets for a 100-day supply. - Immune support mineral: This Zinc 30 mg supplement supports the body's natural immune defense system. - An antioxidant: Zinc supports the vital functions of over 100 different enzymes in the body which is important for overall health. - Key skin health nutrient: Zinc helps support healthy skin. - Adults take one of these Zinc tablets daily with water and a meal; these gluten free Zinc supplements have no color added, no artificial flavors and no preservatives. - United States Pharmacopeia (USP) Verified, #1 Pharmacist Recommended Vitamin & Supplement Brand.* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Made in USA(with globally sourced ingredients)Adults, take 1 tablet daily with water and a meal. Store tightly closed, in a cool, dry place, out of reach of children.
